Containers.Name: alpine-homebridge
Containers.Description: Homebridge is a lightweight NodeJS server you can run on your home network that emulates the iOS HomeKit API. It supports Plugins, which are community-contributed modules that provide a basic bridge from HomeKit to various 3rd-party APIs provided by manufacturers of "smart home" devices. [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/root/.homebridge[/b] This is where homebridge will store it's configuration files.[br]
